moves.1... e5: He probably did his normal opening.
moves.2. Nf3: I decided to attack his pawn.
moves.3. Bc4: I took my bishop out hoping to put it in a good posistion.
moves.3... h6: He moved his pawn one forward probably guessing that I would bring my knight further up the board.
moves.4. O-O: I castled to be on the safe side.
moves.4... d6: He planned to get his bishop out by moving his pawn forward.
moves.5. Nc3: I brung my other knight out.
moves.5... Bd7: He protected his knight with his bishop maybe thinking that I would move my bishop to b5.
moves.7. d4: I didn't do much about that.
moves.8. Nxd4: I took his pawn with my knight.
moves.10. Qxd4: I didn't really have much choice and now I was controling the centre.
moves.10... Be6: He attacked my knight because it was in a strong position.
moves.11. Re1: I did a quite random move.
moves.11... Qe7: Suprisingly, he did not take my knight.
moves.12. Bd2: I just completely missed taking his queen. I so should have won this game.
moves.12... Qd7: The game just carried on until he won but I soooooo should have won this game.

gameName: A game I sooo should have won...
